data.title: Bitcoin (BTC) and Solana (SOL) Price Might See Short-Term Rally This Week!
data.text: A well-known crypto strategist and analyst, Pentoshi, who had predicted the end of the bull market, has revealed his bullish stance towards Bitcoin (BTC) and another currency, Solana (SOL). The analyst tries to claim his stance by informing his 612,000 followers over Twitter that his earlier bearish approach has flipped towards the ongoing bull run.

data.text: BTC/USD Awaits Technical Guidance:  Sally Ho's Technical Analysis – 26 September 2022   Bitcoin (BTC/USD) lacked a clear direction early in the Asian session as the pair was unable to sustain a recent move higher to the 19400 area, right around the 200-hour simple moving average.
